amendment.description: To secure the borders of the United States, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 110, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 138.

action.text: Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Marshall. (consideration: CR S1885) To secure the borders of the United States, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Marshall.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 110, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 138.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 110, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 138.
